list.abs: octroyed constitution and constitution made by people钦定宪法与民定宪法

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in the sense ‘concession’, especially one giving an exclusive right of trade): from French octroyer 'to grant', based on medieval Latin auctorizare (see authorize). Current senses date from the early 18th cent

means.word_mean: 1. a tax on various goods brought into a town
